caption.p: Female patients, 51 ( A) and 68 years old ( B). MDCT shows reticular opacities (arrows) in the anterior segment of the right upper lobe and bilateral subpleural curvilinear lines (arrowheads) in the lower lobes. Additionally, other multifocal opacities with ground-glass attenuation are present. Positive RT-PCR for SARS-CoV-2 in both patients.
